Deprecated API

Contents

  • Deprecated Methods
  • Deprecated Methods 
    Method and Description
    com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.Window.addEmptyLine() 
    com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.GUIScreen.closeWindow()
    Call getActiveWindow().close() instead
    com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.Theme.getBorder()
    use getDefinition instead.
    com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.Theme.getButtonActive()
    use getDefinition instead.
    com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.Theme.getButtonInactive()
    use getDefinition instead.
    com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.Theme.getButtonLabelActive()
    use getDefinition instead.
    com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.Theme.getButtonLabelInactive()
    use getDefinition instead.
    com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.Theme.getCheckBox()
    use getDefinition instead.
    com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.Theme.getCheckBoxSelected()
    use getDefinition instead.
    com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.Theme.getDefault()
    use getDefaultStyle() instead
    com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.Theme.getDialogEmptyArea()
    use getDefinition instead.
    com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.Theme.getItem()
    use getDefinition instead.
    com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.Theme.getItemSelected()
    use getDefinition instead.
    com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.Theme.getRaisedBorder()
    use getDefinition instead.
    com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.Theme.getScreenBackground()
    use getDefinition instead.
    com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.Theme.getShadow()
    use getDefinition instead.
    com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.Theme.getTextBox()
    use getDefinition instead.
    com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.Theme.getTextBoxFocused()
    use getDefinition instead.
    com.googlecode.lanterna.terminal.Terminal.queryTerminalSize()
    Being deprecated since 2.0.1 in favor of getTerminalSize()
    com.googlecode.lanterna.terminal.text.ANSITerminal.queryTerminalSize()
    com.googlecode.lanterna.terminal.text.UnixTerminal.queryTerminalSize()
    com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.component.Panel.setBetweenComponentsPadding(int)
    Use the layout manager to set the padding between components
    com.googlecode.lanterna.gui.GUIScreen.setTitle(String)
    Use a GUI background renderer instead
